entry.title: Fears of Renewed Russian Strikes Hang Over Return to Kharkiv
entry.content: As residents who fled the bombardment of the northern Ukrainian city look to return following Russia’s withdrawal, the threat of attack still looms.

entry.title: Russian Forces Expand Control of Strategic City Severodonetsk
entry.content: In a scenario similar to the battle for Mariupol, a large number of Ukrainian troops in Severodonetsk are holding out near the city’s Azot chemical plant, but reinforcements have been effectively cut off.

entry.title: Afghan Officials Escaped to Luxury Homes Abroad
entry.content: As Afghan evacuees struggle world-wide, some top former officials have landed in villas and beachfront homes.
